data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with n hc,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n hb,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hb,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction a with n ha,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_add,
rw ha,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_assoc,
rw add_assoc,
induction a with n ha,
rw zero_add,
rw zero_add,
rw add_comm,
refl,
rw succ_add,
rw succ_add,
rw ha,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with a ha,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw ha,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
rw zero_add,
induction m with n hm,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hm,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n hb,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hb,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with n hc,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
rw hc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n hb,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_comm,
rw hb,
rw <- add_assoc,
rw add_comm a, --troca lugar n com a --
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with n hn,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_comm,
rw hn,
rw <- add_assoc,
simp,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with n bn,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw bn,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with n nc,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
rw mul_add,
rw nc,
rw mul_comm,
rw add_comm,
rw mul_comm,
rw add_comm,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=

lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
example : mynat → mynat :=

example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q : Q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u:U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q : Q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u:U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b c,
apply a c,
exact (b(c)),

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b c,
exact b(a(c)),

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b c,
apply b,
apply a,
exact c,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro al,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact al,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=

lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
have j : Q -> R := f p,
apply f,
apply p,
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro hpq,
intro hqr,
intro p,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
repeat {rw not_iff_imp_false},
intro pq,
intro qf,
intro pf,
apply qf, -- troca false por Q --
apply pq,
exact pf,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
-- L I J G F E B A --
cc,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
cases pq with p q,
intro qr,
cases qr with q r,
split,
exact p,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq_qp, --pq
cases pq_qp with one two, --qr pr
intro qr, --qr
cases qr with q r,
split,
intro p,
apply q,
apply one,
exact p,
intro r_two,
apply two,
apply r,
exact r_two,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq_qp, --pq
cases pq_qp with one two, --qr pr
intro qr, --qr
cases qr with q r,
split,
intro p,
apply q,
apply one,
exact p,
intro r_two,
apply two,
apply r,
exact r_two,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
cases pq with hp hq,
right,
exact hp,
left,
exact hq,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro p_q_r,
cases p_q_r with p q_r,
cases q_r with q r,
left, --esq
split, --divid
exact p, --isso aqui
exact q, --isso aqui
right, --dir
split, --divid
exact p, --isso aqui
exact r, --isso aqui
intro p_qvp_r, --crie h
cases p_qvp_r with p_e_q p_e_r, --divide o h em dois
cases p_e_q with p q, --divide o a em dois
split, --divide
exact p, --isso aqui
left, --esquerda
exact q, --isso aqui
cases p_e_r with p r, --divide em dois
split, --divide
exact p, --isso aqui
right, --direita
exact r, --isso aqui

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro p_falsep,
cases p_falsep with p falsep,
exfalso,
apply falsep,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases p : P ; by_cases q : Q,
repeat {cc},

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=

theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=

theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
